DOC.brief_title: Vital Signs Pain During Insertion IUD
DOC.detailed_description: The intrauterine device ( IUD ) , one effective safe contraceptive still little used woman . It consider long action reversible contraception ( LARC ) . Among many reason resistance stand fear pain , complication occur insertion . Objective : To evaluate intensity pain outpatient insertion IUD . In addition evaluating change vital sign detect factor associate pain outpatient insertion IUD . Methods : Cross Sectional Retrospective study 285 procedure outpatient insertion IUD . Inclusion criterion age old 18 year , cervical cytology without abnormality , classification Category 1 2 WHO eligibility criterion IUD . The criterion non inclusion patient cardiac arrhythmias gynecological disorder . The insertion IUD conduct outpatient basis without use painkiller . Evaluation vital sign ( blood pressure radial pulse ) perform pre five minute procedure . The pain assessment perform use scale visual analog ( VAS ) , five minute procedure.Correlations pain 's score clinical factor age , parity , BMI , hysterometry , previous vaginal delivery also perform .
